A

addOnSpeechEventListener(SpeechContext.OnSpeechEventListener) - Method in class com.pylon.spokestack.SpeechContext
 

C

com.pylon.spokestack - package com.pylon.spokestack
The SpokeStack package contains the core classes that implement the speech recognition pipeline.
com.pylon.spokestack.android - package com.pylon.spokestack.android
This package contains the android-specific dependencies used in audio/speech processing.
com.pylon.spokestack.libfvad - package com.pylon.spokestack.libfvad
This package wraps the libfvad (https://github.com/dpirch/libfvad) native modules for voice activity detection (VAD).
